title: PC February 23 - Procession in Palermo for Palestine
content:
23 February national strike to which Slai Cobas SC adheres 
 February 24 Day of national mobilization, national event in Milan 
 Also in Palermo you will go down to the square, as Slai Cobas SC we adhere to the procession that from Piazza gains from 4 pm will arrive at the Leonardo war factory. 
 We invite workers, precarious workers, workers ... to participate, do not turn the face on the other side, you do not pretend anything, rebuild the modern fascist government Meloni who wants to impose the unique narrative of their "homeland" to the sound of ever Most war, military expenditure, downloading the social costs of the war for the profit of the masters only on the shoulders of the proletarian and popular masses, of repression and manganelli against workers, students, activists, militants ... who more than rightly descend in the struggle support of the support of the Palestinian people and against the imperialist war
